Interface StylerContextBeta

Interface representing the context for a styler.

interface StylerContext {
    DesktopAPI: Desktop;
    ee: EventEmitterType;
    eventTopicPrefix: string;
    graph: GraphSpec;
    onTaskCanceled?: (() => void);
    onTaskComplete?: ((x: Styler) => void);
    OntologyAPI: Ontology;
    selected: GraphSpec;
    taskID?: string;
}
